name: Door Pog champ
description:
-Game in beta

-only the FIREWORK SHOW works

[Fire workshow]Your goal is to have 10  children(default name) (not including p2 avatar)  in your park. How you may ask? You buy firework(By pressing the sign) and shoot them by pressing   the button. But it would too easy if  it was just, if you  shoot a fire work and a child is too close you will lose that child and money. If you get 10 child(not including p2 avatar) you win and if you have not enough money  to by a firework   you lose. Sometimes a child can get bored and quit your   parc. When you win   all the children quit your parc and you must go to the main menu.
